record.title: MEASURE READ THE FIRST TIME--H.J. RES. 20

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I understand that H.J. Res. 20 has been received from the House and is now at the desk, and I ask for its first reading.

record.chair: The clerk will report the joint resolution by title.
record.narrative: The legislative clerk read as follows:
record.chair: Is there objection to proceeding to the measure?

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, this is the continuing resolution, which is so important to continuing the functions of this Government, but I am objecting to my own request for its second reading.
